page.title: 14A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is{Steven.}When Iget up in the morning I have my breakfast .Then I dress and put the television on.At five to nine I come to school. In the morning we usually do mathe- matics and when we have finished we go out to play at 10,45. After play we come in and do some writing or watch a T.V. programme until 12 noon. I have sandwiches in school or go home for dinner.After dinner we play on the playground if it is dry. In the afternoons we work on projects, go swimming,do handwork or art, games or P.E.,music,read,listen to stories and poetry, or change our library books.We have a short afternoon break. At 3.30. school finishes and I go home,change and play with my friend Ben.My mum calls me in for tea and afterwards I play with my star wars toys until it is time for bed.
